data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sapporo's half?
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 4, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 5, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 6, Sapporo have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Sapporo.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Lucas Fernandes for Sapporo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 8, Hiroshima have a goal kick.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Hiroshima are coming forward and Hayao Kawabe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 14, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Sapporo's Douglas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 17, Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sapporo's half?
Throw-in for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 19, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Anderson Lopes of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 22, Sapporo's Hiroki Miyazawa has been booked in Hiroshima.
Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
In the minute 24, Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Sapporo territory.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Sapporo have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 27, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Hiroshima's area.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Sapporo in Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Sapporo goal kick.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Tsukasa Morishima's finish is wide of the goal.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Play has been interrupted briefly in Hiroshima to check on Douglas, who is grimacing with pain.
Hayato Araki is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Hayato Araki returns to the field for Hiroshima after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 38, Sapporo's Douglas is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 42, Akito Fukumori puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Throw-in for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
Free kick in a good position for Hiroshima!
In the minute 45, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Hiroshima's Yuki Nogami attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Sapporo a goal kick.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Free kick for Sapporo in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo advance rapidly upfield but Akihiko Ikeuchi blows for offside.
In the minute 47, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 50, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Sapporo's Anderson Lopes breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Sapporo.
Goal! Hiroki Miyazawa extends Sapporo lead to 0-2 with a header.
In the minute 53, Akito Fukumori instrumental with a fine assist.
Hiroshima are back in the match in Hiroshima. Leandro Pereira has scored to make it 1-2.
That's a fine assist from Yuya Asano.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 56, The home team have replaced Yoshifumi Kashiwa with Douglas Vieira. This is the first substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
Yuya Asano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
In the minute 57, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Goal! Douglas Vieira equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Hayao Kawabe with an assist there.
In the minute 60, In Hiroshima Hiroshima drive forward through Hayato Araki. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Sapporo throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a throw-in for Sapporo, close to Hiroshima's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, In Hiroshima, Tsukasa Morishima of Hiroshima is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Sapporo just outside Hiroshima's area.
In the minute 66, Tomoki Takamine of Sapporo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Michael Petrovic (Sapporo) is making a first substitution, with Daiki Suga replacing Yoshiaki Komai.
In the minute 66, Michael Petrovic is making the team's second substitution at EDION Stadium with Kazuki Fukai replacing Hiroki Miyazawa.
Throw-in Sapporo.
Sapporo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Sapporo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Sapporo.
In the minute 74, Sapporo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Sapporo.
Hugo Vieira is replacing Douglas for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 78, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Hiroshima surge into the attack at EDION Stadium but Sho Sasaki’s header is off-target.
Sapporo have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Sapporo's half.
Goal kick for Sapporo at EDION Stadium.
Michael Petrovic is making the team's fourth substitution at EDION Stadium with Kosuke Shirai replacing Lucas Fernandes.
In the minute 81, Ryota Hayasaka is replacing Anderson Lopes for the away team.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima make their second substitution with Kosei Shibasaki replacing Yuya Asano.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 88, Akihiko Ikeuchi signals a free kick to Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo have been awarded a corner by Akihiko Ikeuchi.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Douglas Vieira for Hiroshima is whistled offside.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Sapporo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Free kick for Sapporo in the half of Hiroshima.
Can Sapporo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Sapporo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sapporo in their own half.
Sapporo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Sapporo are coming forward and Akito Fukumori gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Akihiko Ikeuchi awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
Akira Ibayashi is replacing Tsukasa Morishima for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
The home team have replaced Hayao Kawabe with Ryo Nagai. This is the fourth substitution made today by Hiroshi Jofuku.
Akito Fukumori (Sapporo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Sho Sasaki is booked for the home team.
